General.Name: North Chemical Industries Co Ltd
General.Description: North Chemical Industries Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells nitrocellulose products in China. It also offers industrial pumps and valves, gas masks, filter absorbers, and other products. The company nitrocellulose products are used in propellant, nitro paint, ink, celluloid products, adhesives, leather oil, nail polish, etc.; activated carbon and catalyst for use in industrial exhaust and sewage treatment, air purification, decolorization, deodorization, etc., protective equipment used in labor protection, and industrial toxic and harmful workplace protection; and environmental protection equipment for use in industrial exhaust gas purification and industrial wastewater treatment. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Nitrocell Co.,Ltd. North Chemical Industries Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Luzhou, the People's Republic of China.

1.Name: Ms. Hong  Shang
1.Title: CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors
